casebody.data:
KEMSLEY MILLBOURN & COMPANY, Limited, Plaintiff in Error, v. Frank K. BOWERS, as Collector, etc., Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 15, 1928. No. 214. Lord, Day & Lord, of New York City (Pranklin Grady and Sharon Graham, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Charles H. Tuttle,' U. S. Atty. (Samuel C. Coleman, Asst. U. S. Atty., of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before' MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
